summary: An ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the laying off of Cloverdale Street, from Beacon Avenue to Fifty-first Avenue South, and of Grattan Street, from Fifty-first Avenue South to Wilson Avenue as established by Ordinance No. 32174, and for the changing and establishing of the grades and grading and regrading of such streets, and making temporary approaches on intersecting side streets, all in the City of Seattle,, as provided for and specified in Ordinance No. 35610, of said city, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
